## ResourceTypes.ResourceType.validate() method

Validates a JSON value for use as a complete resource instance value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
abstract validate(json: JsonValue, isPartial: false): Result<T>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

json


</td><td>

JsonValue


</td><td>

The JSON value to validate.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

isPartial


</td><td>

false


</td><td>

`false` indicates that the value is expected to be complete.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;T&gt;

`Success` with the strongly-typed resource value if the JSON is valid, `Failure` with an error message otherwise.
